name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NinjaPoster - Auto Post to Facebook™ Groups & Pages Organically

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Post to Facebook groups and pages organically

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***NinjaPoster is a unique software that allows you to post to groups organically. You can post to your managed groups and your joined groups with NinjaPoster.***

NinjaPoster comes with features such as:

- Post to groups as a profile or page
- No admin or any other permissions needed
- Posts organically, no flags or bans
- Post text, images, video
- Auto repeat scheduled posts
- Time delay, auto pause, Spintax
- Post from RSS feed *new feature (So every time your website has a new post, it will post that to your chosen groups!!)

Is it LEGAL?
Yes, script doesn’t violate any fb rule, click automation are permitted on Facebook.

Copyright note: Facebook™ is a registered trademark of Facebook Inc. This extension is neither endorsed by or affiliated with Facebook.
